Articles.Content:
Hey All,

I've spent a bit of time figuring this out but it is getting to the point where I'm just systematically going through almost 175 mods trying to figure out which is causing this and I thought perhaps a guru here might be able to give me an off the top of their head answer and save me some pain.

Basically, for some reason all experiments that take place on the ground at KSC produce 0 science. From Crew Reports to Mag Spec to Goo.

Here is an export of my ckan mod list: http://pastebin.com/vJ1sBDjb

Thanks in advance!

(P.S: Is there a place for people sharing ckan mod lists? I'm pretty interested in an RSS setup that does not use real fuels)

EDIT: I found it out. Apparently Real Solar System removes ground science (which I swear when I last played it didn't) so that's the reason.

Edited October 16, 2015 by ocbaker
Found my own solution
